text: mix together flour sugar baking powder
and season make it well in the center
then simply beat six eggs together pour
into the well and whisk into the flour
then whisk in milk making the mixture
lovely and light next add the three
cheeses cottage cheese grated Monterey
Jack or cheddar and cream cheese and
then for extra richness knobs of butter
then butter a baking dish and pour in
your rich cheesy cheats souffle mix now
put in a medium oven and bake for 40
minutes until rich golden and puff to
perfection a stunning fuss-free souffle
that's ideal for brunch
I got that you got that nice crispy skin
on top you can see how much of the stock
has evaporated next add fresh chopped
tomatoes then cumin seeds and fry until
the seeds are fragrant and the tomatoes
are lovely and soft
